name: MapChange
description:
Provides a way for users to move between maps in a campaign without the GM needing to move them.

For full information on how to use the script, use the command '!mc help' in game.

useroptions.name: Debug Mode
useroptions.description: Set to true to use built in debug statements

useroptions.name: GM Notification
useroptions.description: Set to false to turn off notifing the GM when a player moves.

useroptions.name: GM Only
useroptions.description: Set to true to only allow GMs to use the commands.

useroptions.name: Marker
useroptions.description: The marker used to decide what is placed in the private map.

useroptions.name: Inverted Marker
useroptions.description:
When true this places the pages with name containing the marker into the public list.
Use this if you want maps to be private by default instead of public by default.

useroptions.name: Hotspot Prefix
useroptions.description: The prefix used on token to use as map portal hotspot.

useroptions.name: Hotspot Layer
useroptions.description: The layer that the token map portal hotspots can be found on. (all|walls|gmlayer|objects|map)
